source.name: TRI Explorer
source.description: TRI Explorer provides powerful, flexible, user-friendly access to  Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) data to help communities identify facilities and chemical disposal or other release patterns that may warrant further study and analysis. Combined with hazard and exposure information, the TRI Explorer can be a valuable tool for risk identification. The TRI is a centerpiece of the community right-to-know approach for environmental information mandated by the Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act (EPCRA) of 1986.
